name: KRAM's Mutant Ape
description: A Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFT character with distinctive features

traits.fur: Cheetah/leopard print - yellow-gold base with brown spots
traits.eyes: Glowing golden coin eyes with sparkle effects, dripping gold
traits.mouth: Wide grin with mint green gradient teeth, pink gums visible
traits.facial_hair: Brown mustache and beard, shaggy texture
traits.headwear: White bunny ears headpiece with pink/brown inner ears, each ear has a small cartoon face
traits.accessories: Small silver piercing in left ear
traits.companion: Small cheetah creature at bottom with orange eyes and spotted fur

vibe: Chaotic, playful, crypto-degen energy, mutant aesthetic
